text: Aster Vranckx (born 4 October 2002) is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for the Belgian club KV Mechelen. ==Professional career== On 3 December 2018, Vranckx made signed his first professional contract with KV Mechelen. Vranckx made his debut for Mechelen in the 2019 Belgian Super Cup, in a 3–0 loss to K.R.C. Genk. ==International career== Born in Belgium, Vranckx is of Congolese descent. He is a youth international for Belgium. ==References== ==External links== * * Mechelen Profile * Belgian Football Profile Category:2002 births Category:Living people Category:People from Flemish Brabant Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgium youth international footballers Category:Belgian people of Democratic Republic of the Congo descent Category:KV Mechelen players Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Aster Vranckx
